name: Grand Expectation
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Bennett, equip this card.
After Bennett equips this card, immediately use Fantastic Voyage once.
When your Bennett, who has this card equipped, creates an Inspiration Field, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
(You must have Bennett in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1303]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1303] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13033]</color> once.
When your $[A1303], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113031]</color>, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
(You must have $[A1303] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bennett</color>, equip this card.
After Bennett equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color> once.
When your Bennett, who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration Field</color>, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
(You must have Bennett in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: The best adventure is always yet to be.
source: Reward for inviting Bennett to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
